alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 30 at 10:44AM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 4 inches for elevations below 4000 feet, 6 to 12 inches for elevations above 4000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Clearwater Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
